channel.title: k8s on Now with more interwebs.
channel.description: Recent content in k8s on Now with more interwebs.

item.title: Running Rust on Arm with docker
item.description: I have a small home lab kubernetes cluster running k3s from rancher labs. As part of that deployment, the traefik ingress controller is included. This post is first in a series where I muddle through exploring the traefik ingress using a rust webserver. Covered in this post. Rust workloads on k8s with ARM and Docker. What will be running? Since my home lab cluster runs on 4 raspberry pi’s, some work will be needed to get a properly formatted image.
